Name: War Trains
About the game: SOON... The world as we knew it has been destroyed by the apocalypse... But the railroads have survived the war. And now you need to survive the post-apocalyptic era with their help. 1. Drive the train; 2. Operate the machine gun; 3. Fight other players in PvP battles; 4. Drive around the town.
